featured.text: Soon Saratoga Chips appeared on the menu and became so popular that people wanted to take some home.
Picture an elegant restaurant in Saratoga Springs, New York, in 1853.

definition.zh_def: 薩拉托加，指美國紐約州的一個城市，以其賽馬和溫泉聞名。
definition.en_def: Saratoga is a city in New York State, known for its horse racing and mineral springs.
definition.example: Every summer, thousands of visitors flock to Saratoga for the famous horse races.
